title: HDFC Bank announces 15% dividend, board approves stock buyback
content: HDFC Bank's board approved a 15% dividend and cleared a share buyback program citing strong capital position and earnings momentum. Analysts expect capital return to support shareholder value.

title: RBI raises repo rate by 25bps to 6.75%, citing inflation concerns
content: The Reserve Bank of India increased the benchmark repo rate by 25 basis points to 6.75% in a move aimed at tackling persistent inflation pressures. The central bank signaled a vigilant stance.

title: ICICI Bank opens 500 new branches across Tier-2 cities
content: ICICI Bank expanded its footprint by inaugurating 500 branches across Tier-2 and Tier-3 locations, targeting retail and MSME loan growth. The bank plans to deepen presence in underpenetrated markets.

title: Banking sector NPAs fall to 5-year low; credit growth at 16%
content: India's banking sector reported gross NPAs at a five-year low while credit growth accelerated to 16%, supported by strong retail and services demand. Analysts expect asset quality to remain benign.

title: TCS wins $1.2B deal from European retail chain to modernize IT
content: Tata Consultancy Services bagged a multi-year $1.2 billion contract from a major European retailer for cloud migration and application modernization. The deal strengthens TCS's presence in Europe.

title: Infosys to hire 20,000 freshers, focuses on AI services
content: Infosys announced plans to hire 20,000 graduates in FY25 while ramping up investments in AI and automation services. Management highlighted rising enterprise demand for generative AI solutions.

title: Wipro launches cloud-native cybersecurity platform for BFSI
content: Wipro unveiled a cloud-native cybersecurity platform tailored for BFSI clients, integrating threat detection, response automation, and compliance features to reduce cyber risk.

title: HCL Tech partners with Nvidia to expand AI solutions
content: HCLTech announced a strategic partnership with Nvidia to co-develop industry-specific AI solutions, including for manufacturing and healthcare, leveraging Nvidia's accelerated computing.

title: Sun Pharma receives USFDA approval for generic oncology drug
content: Sun Pharmaceutical Industries received final USFDA approval for a generic version of a widely used oncology drug. The product will be launched in the US market this quarter.

title: Dr. Reddy's to acquire rights to novel migraine therapy in India
content: Dr. Reddy's Laboratories signed a licensing agreement to commercialize a novel migraine therapy in India, expanding its specialty portfolio and strengthening neurology presence.

title: Cipla launches respiratory inhaler in EU market
content: Cipla launched a new respiratory inhaler across select EU markets, aiming to tap chronic obstructive pulmonary disease management. The company continues to scale its global respiratory franchise.

title: Tata Motors reports record EV sales, expands charging network
content: Tata Motors reported record quarterly EV sales, attributing momentum to new models and expanded charging infrastructure across key cities.

title: Maruti Suzuki launches new compact SUV with ADAS features
content: Maruti introduced a compact SUV with advanced driver-assistance systems, targeting the fast-growing premium segment. Bookings open nationwide.

title: Mahindra & Mahindra unveils electric tractor prototype
content: M&M showcased an electric tractor prototype aimed at reducing farm operating costs and emissions. Pilot programs to commence in select states.

title: Reliance Industries to invest in green hydrogen ecosystem
content: Reliance announced plans to invest significantly in green hydrogen production and distribution, aligning with its clean energy roadmap and net-zero targets.

title: ONGC discovers new oil field in Krishna-Godavari basin
content: Oil and Natural Gas Corporation reported a fresh discovery in the KG basin expected to enhance domestic crude output after appraisal drilling.

title: NTPC commissions 500 MW solar plant in Rajasthan
content: NTPC commissioned a 500 MW solar project in Rajasthan, taking its total renewable capacity to a new high and supporting India's clean energy goals.

title: India's CPI inflation eases to 5.1% in February
content: Headline CPI inflation cooled to 5.1% in February led by moderation in food prices. Economists expect the RBI to keep a cautious stance while monitoring core inflation.

title: IIP growth accelerates to 7.5% on manufacturing rebound
content: Industrial production picked up to 7.5% supported by strong manufacturing output and electricity generation. Analysts see signs of capex cycle revival.

title: Forex reserves hit record high of $650 billion
content: India's foreign exchange reserves climbed to a fresh record of $650 billion amid robust capital inflows and steady current account dynamics.

title: Reserve Bank hikes interest rates by 0.25% in surprise move
content: In an unscheduled decision, the Reserve Bank lifted the policy rate by 0.25 percentage points to curb inflationary pressures. Markets priced in a hawkish stance.

title: Central bank raises policy rate 25bps, signals hawkish stance
content: The central bank increased the policy repo rate by 25 basis points and indicated it would remain vigilant against inflation risks, keeping liquidity conditions tight.

title: HDFC Bank to return cash via dividend and buyback
content: HDFC Bank said it will return capital through a double-barreled approach: a 15% dividend and a board-approved share repurchase, supported by robust profitability.

title: Bank regulator tweaks liquidity norms for NBFCs
content: The RBI announced changes to liquidity coverage norms for systemically important NBFCs to strengthen resilience during stress scenarios.

title: Axis Bank raises $500 million via sustainable bonds
content: Axis Bank issued $500 million in sustainable bonds to fund green and social projects, receiving strong demand from global investors.

title: Kotak Mahindra Bank launches premium wealth platform
content: Kotak Mahindra Bank introduced a premium wealth management platform offering curated products and advisory for HNI clients.

title: SBI reports record UPI transactions on festival weekend
content: State Bank of India processed record Unified Payments Interface transactions during the festival weekend, reflecting strong digital payment adoption.

title: Infosys expands partnership with Microsoft for cloud transformation
content: Infosys deepened its collaboration with Microsoft to accelerate enterprises' cloud transformation using Azure, including data modernization and AI-infused applications.

title: RBI keeps policy rate unchanged, maintains withdrawal of accommodation
content: The Reserve Bank of India left the policy rate unchanged and reiterated its stance of withdrawal of accommodation while monitoring inflation risks.

title: TCS bags mega deal from European retailer for cloud migration
content: TCS secured a multi-billion, multi-year engagement with a leading European retailer to migrate applications to cloud and modernize IT landscape.

title: CPI inflation at 5.1% offers relief; food prices ease
content: Consumer inflation moderated to 5.1% as food inflation cooled. Economists believe the RBI could gain more confidence before easing policy.

title: Reserve Bank of India increases repo rate by 25 basis points
content: RBI increased the repo rate by 25 bps in a move to tackle inflation risks and maintain price stability, signaling a hawkish bias.

title: HDFC Bank declares dividend; board okays share repurchase
content: HDFC Bank declared a 15% dividend and approved a stock buyback, citing strong capital adequacy and profitability metrics.

title: Banking sector update: NPAs at 5-year low; credit growth robust
content: Sector-wide update indicates NPAs declined to a five-year low while loan growth remained strong at 16%, supported by retail demand and infra push.
